General.Name: Hunan Fazhan Industrial Co Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Hunan Development Group Co., Ltd. engages in the development and operation of hydroelectric power generation in China. It produces and supplies electricity. It also engages in the community home-based elderly care services, government purchase of home-based elderly care services, smart elderly care information platforms, and related businesses; sale of river sand, river pebbles, crushed stones, and other products; distribution of sand and gravels; and equity investment business. In addition, the company is involved in leasing of self-owned house; development and operation of land and mineral resources; and operation of nursing homes. As of December 31, 2022, the company's power grid consisted of an installed capacity of 44.87 million kilowatts, including 21.05 million kilowatts of thermal power, 11.662 million kilowatts of hydropower, 8.909 million kilowatts of wind power, 2.322 million kilowatts of photovoltaic power plants, and 927,000 kilowatts of biomass and waste power plants. Hunan Development Group Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Changsha, China.
General.Address: No.42, Everbright Development Building, Changsha, China, 410015
